name: E-commerce website with customer support
tagline: this is a generalized e-commerce website with basic features
body:
### Welcome to E-commerce with customer support Pages.
E-commerce with customer is the project that was developed in PHP. I have developed it in the third year of my undergraduate. 

### How to run it
1) download the stationshop folder
2) install the database
3) configure the config file that is present in the function folder

### Admin Panel
To use admin panel go to this URL
ursiteurl/stationshop/admin/
then type mohit as username and mohit1 as password

### Authors and Contributors
you can edit it and if you have modified the code you can upload it to the repository 

### Support or Contact
If you are facing any problem with running the project, feel free to contact me 
email: mohithamgaonkar@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
